definitions.body: † [[יִשָּׂשכָר]]:48 (so always MT, Qr perpet.; Ben Napht. [[יִשְׂשָׂכָר]] Baer:Gn p. 84 f.)

definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Issachar (etym. and mng. dub.; MT as if Niph. Impf. √ [[שׂכר]]; Kt = [[יֵשׁ שָׂכָר]] there is recompense (cf. Ge 30:18), so Thes al.; this the true etym. acc. to Ol:§§ 69 c; 277 f. Kö:i. 120 v. [[יֵשׁ שָׂכָר]] Je 31:16, 2Ch 15:7; = [[אִישׁ]] [[שָׂכָר]] (a more prob. combination in n.pr.) We:Sam 95; > [[יִשָּׂכָר]] (MT), or [[יִשָּׂא שׂכר]]; LXX Issaxar, see esp. Ge 30:18 Issxar, o)/ e)stin misqo/v)—

fifth son of Jacob and Leah (appar. ninth son of Jacob) Ge 30:18, Ge 35:23, Ge 46:13, Ge 49:14, Ex 1:3, Nu 1:8; ´[[בְּנֵי ישׂ]] Nu 1:28, Nu 2:5, Nu 26:23, Jos 19:17, 1Ch 7:1, 1Ch 12:33 (v:1Ch 12:32 van d. H.); ´[[מִשְׁפְּחוֹת ישׂ]] Nu 26:25, 1Ch 7:5; ´[[מַטֵּה ישׂ]] Nu 1:29, Nu 2:5, Nu 13:7, Jos 21:6, Jos 21:28, 1Ch 6:47, 1Ch 6:57; ´[[מטה בני ישׂ]] Nu 10:15, Nu 34:26, Jos 19:23; ´[[בֵּית ישׂ]] 1Ki 15:27; hence ´[[ישׂ]] alone = tribe of Issachar, Nu 7:18, De 27:12, De 33:18, Jos 19:17, Ju Jdg 5:15, Jdg 5:15, Jdg 10:1, Ez Eze 48:33 (´[[שׁער ישׂ]]), 1Ch 27:18, 2Ch 30:18; = territory of the tribe Jos 17:10, Jos 17:11, 1Ki 4:17, 1Ch 12:41 (v:1Ch 12:40 van d. H.); transit. fr. tribe to territory Ez Eze 48:25, Eze 48:26.
